title: Bug 116609 [Regression] Color orange doesn't work.
description:
Bug 116609 [Regression] Color orange doesn't work. 
Description: The orange color does not display correctly. 
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the settings menu.
3. Select the 'Color' option.
4. Choose the 'Orange' color.
5. Observe the result.
EB: Expected result: The orange color should be displayed correctly.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the settings menu.
3. Select the 'Color' option.
4. Choose the 'Orange' color.
5. Observe if the orange color is displayed correctly.
